attributes.action: For once do what the people of this country want
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country is in financial problems of its own compounded by our so called PM, to not rule out helping the Euro countries is a complete travesty. You have ruined my country and I want you out, you pay up for the Greeks and there will be revolution!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
